text:
Hey guys,

Do you know why we can't use `OR` and `AND` operators in filtergroups when query HubDB data with graphQL <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/data/query-HubSpot-data-using-graphql#combine-multiple-filters-and-use-conditional-logic>
it is a limitation of hubdb. OR only works with CRM data for now :cry:

thanks <@U3T21PDBK>

So I guess the best course of action is duplicating query and changing filters
yes. If using this returned data with hubl, then you can look into the `|intersect` filter
